ing: 2 ripe avocados - peeled, seeded, and mashed
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker pie crust
1 cup whipped cream, or as desired
n: The Best Lemon Lime Avocado Pie
des: "Don't tell anyone and they won't know it's avocado! This amazingly easy, super-refreshing pie is a hit every time! No baking; mix the filling in a blender for super-speedy results! For picnics or potlucks, this recipe works well in mini pie crusts too. Just make sure that the pie crusts are baked and cooled before pouring in the filling."
ins: Blend avocados, sweetened condensed milk, cream cheese, lime juice, and lemon juice in a blender until smooth; pour into prepared pie crust. Refrigerate 30 minutes. Top with whipped cream to serve.
